column4: HI I need to mount this External USB hdd Permanently 24/7 the UUID is e95890e6-66d4-40e6-86a8-6a260269e1d7 and it's on /dev/sde1  how would I set Fstab up for this?
what fs is the external hdd using
ext3
mkdir /mnt/externalHDD   then  mount -t ext3 /dev/sda1 /mnt/externalHDD
its already mounted
/dev/sda1 isnt my external that's my main internal hdd
in fstab <device> <mountpoint> <filesystem> <mount options> 0 0
do you know anything about this --> https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux-source-2.6.15/+bug/39315 I'm hhaving the same problem on 8.10
dont ask me, ask the channel :)
I dont have 8.10 so i would be of no use
i did ask the channel, I had helped you before, was just curoius if you  could return the favor :)
I will gladly return the favor, if i knew the answer and if it doe3snt have anything to do with 8.10 ;)
cool, it;s not so much 8.10 as it is aaa kernel bug
I could help with researching since no one else seems to be assisting you,
obvious question maybe, but have you tried any of the solutions from any of the people that have commented on that site?
doesnt do any good, have already showed him 4 times already
are you willing to walk him through how to use vi :P
forums are working fine for me (using Opera)
cool, I'm looking at it right no with FF and it looks as thought the css stylesheet has been removed or not being linked to
that's firefox for ya :P
yeah, opera what ? :P
